tasks.label: 🔁 Toggle Lock
args: grep -q '"files.readonlyInclude": {}' .vscode/settings.json 2>/dev/null && echo '{"files.readonlyInclude": {"**/app/**": true, "**/resources/js/**": true, "**/routes/**": true}}' > .vscode/settings.json || echo '{"files.readonlyInclude": {}}' > .vscode/settings.json
